mutants.original_line: variance = sum((x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers) / n
mutants.mutated_line: variance = sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers)) * n
mutants.code:
import math
import statistics

def calculate_standard_deviation(numbers):
    n = len(numbers)
    mean = statistics.mean(numbers)
    variance = sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers)) * n
    std_deviation = math.sqrt(variance)
    return std_deviation
